comment: Seems like a cool dude I just didn't go to lecture a lot but when I did it was cool.

Constantly brags/name drops. Pretends to care but is very rude and condescending. MEBUS was the reason I chose KSU but Keith ruined the experience. If u can't dedicate a majority of your time to MEBUS then don't waste any of your time. A friend warned me before but I didn't listen bc it seemed like a good opportunity. If u can kiss up you'll be ok

Keith is a mentor. He is someone who will look to push you to achieve what you want. Everyone always says they have one professor who really cared and helps push them toward success and he is that if you are willing to work hard. The class is designed for people who want to break into the entertainment industry and is not meant for an easy A.

Keith has lots of experience in the entertainemt industry and can really help you out getting a solid portfolio. He comes off as a know-it-all occasionally, and can be kind of intimidating at times. But this guy knows what he's talking about and is available to talk and work with students a lot.

I signed up for MEBUS excited to gain knowledge and experience in the entertainment world. Keith came off as being a caring and passionate individual, but my views of him changed quickly when i started the class. He is very condescending, calls you out, claims to know "everyone," and an all around rude individual. Danny is great, but not Keith.

way to much over hype. group project sucks and he assigns way over the amount of people needed for a project. dont plan on taking any further classes but danny is a cool professor, he does all the teaching and super nice guy.

Do NOT take this class as an outside elective! This class makes you do way more than you should, & the professor doesn't even lecture. The professor drops a lot of F bombs, so if you're easily offended, don't take it. The majority of the class involves guests speakers & they expect you to give them ideas & take credit for your intellectual property
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Keith is the brains and the passion behind the MEBUS program. He is there for each and every one of his students as long as they show passion and a willingness to succeed in the industry. He will set you up for success. He does what he does because he loves helping students, not because he has to. He is the true definition of a teacher that CARES.

Had him for the Intro MEBUS class, awesome guy who loves what he does. He is very experienced in the field that he teaches along with Danny. Willing to work with you if things come up and you can't make it to class. Great guy, Great Class 10/10 would recommend.
